template.name: BOND
template.comment:
- 4 - ***** INPUT FOR BOND LENGTH PARAMETERS *****
IBT , JBT , RK , REQ
FORMAT(A2,1X,A2,2F10.2)
IBT,JBT Atom symbols for the two bonded atoms.
RK The harmonic force constant for the bond "IBT"-"JBT". The unit is kcal/mol/(A**2).
REQ The equilibrium bond length for the above bond in angstroms
The input is terminated by a blank card.

BOND cq-ca 428.1 1.397 k (3_2: 5 points @0.01A == 0-1 Kcal), dist from mp2/6-31G* c2-cq 330.1 1.461 k (1_2: 5 points @0.01A == 0->1.2 Kcal) dist from mp2/6-31G* c2-cd 364.0 1.424 k (1_16: 10 points @0.01A == 0->al3.5 Kc) distr fom /mp2*6-31G cc-nh 495.0 1.352 k (33_28: 5 points @0.01A == 0->1.5 Kcal) dist from mp2/6-31G*
